sections.text: prAqṇO rakśhati̍ viśvamEjat|̍ iryO# BUtvA bahudhA̍ bahUni|̍ sa ithsarvaM ~MvyAnaśE|̍ | yO dEvO dEvEśhu# viBUrantaH| AvRudUdAt̍ kśhEtriyaddhvagadvRuśhA̱|̍ tamit prAqṇaM manasO paśikśhata|̍ agraM̍ dEvAnA-midama̍ttu̍ nO haviH| | manasaścittEdam|̍ BUtaM BavyaM̍ ca gupyatE| taddhi dEvEśhvagriyam|̍ | 1 (10)

A na# Etu puraścaram| saha dEvairimaṃ hava̱m| manaH śrEyasi̍ śrEyasi| karman.̍ yajñapatiM̍ dadhat|̍ | juśhatA̱M mE vAgidaṃ haviH| virADdEvI purOhitA|̍ havyavADana# pAyinI| | yayA# rUpAṇi# bahudhA vadanti|̍ pEśAṃsi̍ dEvAH paramE̍ janitrE̱| sAnO# virADanapasPurantI|̍ 2 (10)

vAgdEvI juśhatAmidaṃ̍ haviH| | cakśhur̍ dEvAnAqM jyOtiramRutE̍ nyaktam|̍ asya vijñAnAya̍ bahudhA nidhIyatE|̍ tasya# sumna-maśImahi|̍ mA nO# hAsId-vicakśhaṇam| | AyurinnaH pratI̱ryatAm| anandhAq-ścakśhu̍śhA̍ vayam| jIvA jyOtiraśImahi|̍ suvarjyOti-rutAmRuta̱m|̍ | śrOtrEṇa̍ Badra muta śRuṇvanti̍ satyam ( )| śrOtrEṇa̍ vAcaM̍ bahudhOdya mAnAm|̍ śrOtrEṇa̍ mOdaśca̍ mahaśca̍ śrUyatE| śrOtrEṇa̍ sarvAq diśa AśRuṇOmi|̍ | yEna prAcyA# uta dakśhiṇA|̍ pratIcyai# diśaH śRuṇvantyuttarAt|̍ tadicCrOtraM̍ bahudhOdyamAnam|̍ arAnna nEmiH pari sarvaM̍ baBUva| | 3 (17) (agri - yamanapasPurantI̍ - satyaṃ sapta ca)̍ (A1) 2. 5. 2 upahOmAH

udEhi# vAjinyO asyaPsva̍ntaH|̍ idaṃ rAqśhTramAviśa̍ sUnRutAvat|̍ yO rOhitO̍ viśvamidaM̍ jajAna|̍ sa nO# rAqśhTrEśhu sudhitAndadhAtu|̍ | rOhaṃ# rOhaṃq rOhita̍ ArurOha|̍ prajABirvRuddhiM̍ januśhAmupastha̱m|̍ tABiH saṃrabdhO̍ avidathśhaDurvIH| gAqtuM prapaśyanniha̍ rAqśhTramAhA̱H| | AhAṛ̍ śhId-rAqśhTramiha rOhitaH|̍ mRudhO vyA̱sthadaBayaM̍ nO astu| 4 (10)

asmaByaM̍ dyAvApRuthivI śakvarIBiH|̍ rAqśhTraM duhAthAmiha̍ rEvatIBiH|̍ | vimamaṛ̍ śa rOhitO̍ viśvarUpaH|̍ samAqcakrAqṇaH praruhO ruhaśca|̍ divagaMtvAya̍# mahatA mahimnA|̍ vi nO# rAqśhTramunattu̍ payasAq̍ svEna|̍ | yAstE viśastapasA̍ saMbaBUvuH| gAqyatraM ~Mvathsamanu tAsta AguH|̍ tAstvA viśantu̍ mahasAq̍ svEna|̍ saM mAtA̍ putrO aByEtu̍ rOhitaH|̍ | 5 (10)

yUyamugrA̍ marutaH pRuśnimAtaraH| indrEṇa̍ sayujAq pramRuṇItha̍ śatrUn|̍ A vO rOhitO̍ aśRuṇOdaBidyavaH| trisaptAsO̍ marutaH svAdusaMmudaH| | rOhitO̍ dyAvApRuthivI̍ jajAna|̍ tasmiṅqstantuM̍ paramEśhThI tatAna|̍ tasmi~jCiśriyE̍ aja EkapAt|̍ adRuṃ# haddyAvApRuthivI̍ balEna|̍ | rOhitO̍ dyAvApRuthivI̍ adRuṃhat|̍ tEna suvaH̍ staBitaM tEna nAkaH|̍ 6 (10)

sO antarikśhE̍ rajasO̍ vimAnaH|̍ tEna# dEvAH suvaranvavindann|̍ | suśEvaM̍ tvA BAqnavO# dIdivAṃsa̱m| samagrAsO̍ juhvO# jAtavEdaH| ukśhanti# tvA vAqjinamA GRutEna|̍ saṃsamagnE̍ yuvasE BOjanAni|̍ | agnE śarddha# mahatE sauBagAya|̍ tava# dyumnA-nyuttamAni̍# santu| saM jA̱spatyaṃ suyamamAkRuṇuśhva|̍ śatrUyatAmaBitiśhThAq̍ mahAsi̍ ( )| | 7 (10) (a- stvEtu rOhitO̍ - nAkO - mahAṃsi)̍ (A2) 2. 5. 3 upahOmAH

punarna̍ indrO# maGavA# dadAtu| dhanAni̍ śakrO GanyaH̍ surAdhA̱H| arvAqcInaM̍ kRuṇutAM ~MyAcitO manaH|̍ śruśhTI nO# asya haviśhO# juśhAqṇaH| | yAni# nO jinan dhanAni|̍ jahartha# śUra manyunA̱| indrAnuvinda̍ nastAni|̍ anEna# haviśhAq punaH|̍ | indra AśA̱ByaH pari|̍ sarvAqByO&BayaM̍ karat| 8 (10)

jEtAq śatrUnq. vicaṛ̍ śhaṇiH| | AkU̱tyai tvAq kAmAya̍ tvA samRudhE̱ tvA| purO dadhE̍ amRutatvAya# jIvasE̱| | AkUtimasyAva̍sE|̍ kAmamasya̍ samRuddhyai|̍ indrasya̍ yu~jjatE dhiyaH|̍ | AkUtiM̍ dEvIM manasaH̍ purO dadhE|̍ yajñasya# mAqtA suhavA# mE astu| yadicCAmi manasAq̍ sakAmaH|̍ vidEyamEnaddhRuda̍yE̍ niviśhTam|̍ | 9 (10)

sEdagniragnIṃ ratyE̱tyanyAn| yatra# vAqjI tanayO̍ vIDupAṇiH|̍ sahasrapAthA̍ akśharA# samEti|̍ | AśAnAM̍ tvA &&śApAqlEByaH|̍ caturByO# amRutE̱ByaH| idaM BUtasyAddhyakśhEByaH|̍ vidhEma# haviśhA# vayam| | viśvAq AśAq madhunAq̍ saṃsRujAmi|̍ anamIvA Apa OśhadhayO̍ Bavantu| ayaM ~MyajamAnO̍ mRudhO vyasyatAm̍ ( )| 10 (10)

agRuBItAH̍ paśavaH̍ santu sarvE̱| | agniH sOmO varuṇO̍ mitra indraH|̍ bRuhaspatiH̍ savitA yaH sahasrI|̍ pUśhA nO gOBiravasAq̍ sarasvatI|̍ tvaśhTA# rUpAṇi samanaktu̍ yajñaiH| | tvaśhTA# rUpAṇi dadhatI̍ sarasvatI|̍ pUśhA Bagaṃ# savitA nO# dadAtu| bRuhaspatir-dadadindraH̍ sahasra̱m| mitrO dAqtA varuṇaH̍ sOmO# agniH| | 11 (9) 2. 5. 4 upahOmAH

A nO# Bara Bagamindra̍ dyumanta̱m| ni tE# dEśhṇasya# dhImahi prarEkE| urva iva̍ paprathE kAmO# asmE| tamApRuṇA̍ vasupatE vasUnAm|̍ | imaM kAmaM̍ mandayAq gOBiraśvai̱H| candravatAq̍ rAdhasA̍ paprathaśca|̍ suvaryavO# matiBistuByaM ~MviprA̱H| indrAya̍ vAhaH̍ kuśikAsO# akrann| | indrasya̍ nu vIryAṇi̍ pravOcam|̍ yAni# cakAra# prathamAni# vajrI| 12 (10)

aha-nnahimanvapastatarda|̍ pra vakśhaṇA# aBinat parvatAnAm|̍ | ahannahiM parvatE̍ śiśriyAqṇam| tvaśhTA̱&smai vajraṅ# svaryaM̍ tatakśha| vAqśrA iva̍ dhEnavaH syandamAnAH|̍ a~jjaH̍ samudra-mavajagmurApa̍H|̍ | vRuśhAqyamAṇO&vRuṇIta̍ sOma̱m| trikadrukEśhva-pibath̍ sutasya|̍ A sAyakaM̍ maGavA# datta vajra̱m| ahannEnaM̍ prathamajA mahInAm|̍ | 13 (10)

yadindrAhan-prathamajA̍ mahInAm|̍ AnmAqyinAqmaminAqH̍ prOta mAqyAH| Ath sUryaM̍ janayan dyAmuśhAsa̱m| tAqdIknAq śatrUnna kilAvivithsE|̍ | ahan̍ vRutraM ~MvRutrataraM̍ ~Mvyaṃsa̱m| indrO vajrEṇa̍ mahatA vadhEna|̍ skandhAṃsIva̍ kuliśEnAq̍ vivRukṇA|̍ ahiH̍ śayata upapRuk-pRuthivyAm|̍ | ayOddhyEva durmada A hi juhvE| mahAqvIraM tu# vibAqdha-mRujIśham|̍ 14 (10)

nAtArIrasya̍ samRutiM̍ ~MvadhAnA̱m| saṃ rujAnA̱H pipiśha indraśatruH|̍ | viśvO vihAyA̍ aratiH| vasurdadhE̍ hastE dakśhiṇE|̍ taraṇirna śiśrathat|̍ śravasyayAq̍ na śiśrathat|̍ viśvasmAq̍ idiśhuddhyasE|̍ dEvatrA havyamUhiśhE|̍ viśvasmAq̍ ithsukRutE vAramRuṇvati|̍ agnir dvArAq vyRuṇvati|̍ | 15 (10)

udujjihAnO̍ aBi kAmamIrayann̍|̍ prapRu~jcan viśvAq BuvanAni̍ pUrvathA̱| A kEtunAq suśhamiddhO̍ yajiśhThaH|̍ kAmaM̍ nO agnE aBiharya̍ digByaH| | juśhAqṇO havyamamRutEśhu̍ dUDhyaH|̍ A nO# rayiM bahulA~g̍ gOmatImiśha̱m|̍ nidhEhi̍ yakśhadamRutE̍śhu̍ BUśhann|̍ | aśvinA̍ yajñamAgatam|̍ dAqśuśhaH purudaṃsasA|̍ pUśhA rakśhatu̍ nO rayim| | 16 (10)

imaM ~MyajñamaśvinA# varddhayantA|̍ imau rayiM ~MyajamAnAya̍ dhattam| imau paśUn rakśhatAM̍ ~MviśvatO# naH| pUśhA naH̍ pAtu sadama-prayucCann|̍ | pra tE# mahE sarasvati|̍ suBagE̍ vAjinIvati|̍ satyavAcE# BarE matim| | idaM tE# havyaM GRutavath-sarasvati|̍ satyavAcE praBarEmA̍ havIṃśhi|̍ imAni# tE duritA sauBagAni̍ ( )| tEBirvayaṃ̍ suBagAsaH̍ syAma| | 17 (11) (vaj - yrahInA̍ - mRujIśhaM - ~MvyRuṇvati̍ - rakśhatu nO rayiṃ - sauBagAqnyEka̍M̍ ca) (A4) 2. 5. 5 upahOmAH

yajñO rAqyO yajña IśE̍ vasUnAm|̍ yajñaH sasyAnAmuta̍ sukśhitInAm|̍ yajña iśhTaH pUrvacittiM̍ dadhAtu| yajñO brahmaṇvAṃ̍ apyEtu̍ dEvAn| | ayaM ~MyajñO varddhatAqM̍ gOBiraśvai̱H| iyaM ~MvEdiH̍ svapatyA suvIrA̱| idaM barq. hirati# bara. hIṅśhyanyA| imaM ~MyajñaM ~MviśvE# avantu dEvAH| | Baga# Eva BagavAṃ̍ astu dEvAH| tEna# vayaM BagavantaH̍ syAma| 18 (10)

taM tvA# Baga sarva ijjOhavImi|̍ sa nO# Baga pura EtA BavEha|̍ | Baga praṇEtar̍ Baga satyarAdhaH|̍ BagEmAM dhiyamudava̍ dadannaH|̍ Baga praṇO# janaya gOBiraśvai̱H| Baga pra nRuBir̍ nRuvantaH̍ syAma| | śaśvatIH̍ samAq upayanti̍ lOkAH| śaśvatIH̍ samAq upayantyApa̍H|̍ iśhTaM pUrtaṃ śaśvatInAqṃq̍ samAnAṃ̍ śAśvatEna|̍ haviśhEśhTvA &nantaM ~MlOkaM paramArurOha|̍ | 19 (10)

iyamEva sA yA prathamA̍ vyaucCat|̍ sA rUpAṇi# kurutE pa~jca# dEvI| | dvE svasArau̍ vayatastantramEtat|̍ sanAqtanaM ~Mvitataṃq̍ śhaṇmayUKam|̍ avAqnyAṅ stantU̱n kiratO# dhattO anyAn| nAvapRujyAtE̍ na gamAtE̍ anta̱m| | A vO# yantUdavAqhAsO# adya| vRuśhTiM ~MyE viśvE# marutO# junanti|̍ ayaM ~MyO agnir marutaH̍ samiddhaH|̍ EtaM juśhaddhvaM̍ kavayO yuvAnaH| | 20 (10)

dhAqrAqvarA marutO# dhRuśhṇuvOjasaH|̍ mRugA na BImAstaviśhEBi̍-rUrmiBi̍H|̍ agnayO na śuśucAqnA̍ RujIśhiṇa̍H|̍ BrumiM dhamanta̍ upa gA avRuṇvata|̍ | "vicakramE{1}",̍ "trirdEvaH{2}"| | AvEdhasaM nIlapRuśhThaM̍ bRuhanta̱m| bRuhaspatiṃq sadanE̍ sAdayaddhvam| sAqdadyOniM̍ dama AdIdivAṃsa̱m|̍ hiraṇyavarṇamaruśhaṃ̍ sapEma|̍ | sa hi śuciH̍ śatapatraH̍ sa śundhyUH| 21 (10)

hiraṇyavAśIriśhiraH̍ suvara.̍ śhAH| bRuhaspatiH sa svAvEśa̍ RuśhvAH| pUrU saKiBya̍ A sutiM kariśhThaH|̍ | pUśhaṅqstava# vratE vayam| na riśhyEma̍ kadA cana| stOtArasta̍ iha smasi|̍ | yAstE# pUśhannAvO# antaH samudrE|̍ hiraṇyayIrantari̍kśhE̍ caranti|̍ yABiryAsi̍ dUtyAṃ sUryasya|̍ kAmEna̍ kRutaH śrava# icCamAnaH|̍ | 22 (10)

araṇyAqnyara̍ṇyAnyasau|̍ yA prEva naśyasi|̍ kathA grAmaM na pRucCasi|̍ na tvAq BIriva̍ vindatI(3)| | vRuśhAqravAya vadatE|̍ yadupAvati̍ ciccikaH| AqGAqTIBiriva̍ dhAqvayann|̍ araṇyAqnir-mahIyatE|̍ | uta gAva# ivAdann| utO vEśmEva̍ dRuśyatE| 23 (10)

utO araṇyAqniH̍ sAqyam| śakaTIriva̍ sarjati| | gAma~ggaiśha Ahvayati|̍ dArva~ggaiśha upAvadhIt|̍ vasannaraṇyAqnyAṃ̍ sAqyam| akrukśhaditi̍# manyatE| | na vA araṇyAqniṛ̍ hanti|̍ anyaścEnnABigacCati|̍ svAqdOH Palasya̍ jagdhvA| yatra kAmaM nipadyatE̍ ( )| | A~jjanagandhIṃ̍ suraBIm| bahvannAmakRuśhIvalAm|̍ prAhaM mRugAṇA̱M mAqtara̱m| araṇyAqnImaśaṃ-siśham|̍ | 24 (14) 2. 5. 6 upahOmAH

vArtrahatyAya̍ śavasE|̍ pRutanAq-sAhyAya̍ ca| indratvA-&&vartayAmasi|̍ | subrahmAṇaM̍ ~MvIravantaM̍ bRuhanta̱m| uruM gaBIraM̍ pRuthubuddhnamindra|̍ śrutaṛ śhi-mugrama̍Bi-mAtiśhAha̱m|̍ asmaByaM̍ citraM ~MvRuśhaṇaṃ̍ rayiM dA̱H| | kśhEtriyai tvAq niṛ Rutyai̍ tvA| druhO mu~jcAmi̍ varuṇasya̍ pAśA̱t| anAqgasaM brahmaṇE̍ tvA karOmi| 25 (10)

śivE tE dyAvApRuthivI̍ uBE imE| | śaM tE# agniH sahAdBirastu|̍ śaM dyAvApRuthivI̍ sahauśhadhIBiH|̍ śamantarikśhaṃ̍ saha vAtEna̍ tE| śaM tE catasraH̍ pradiśO# Bavantu| | yA daivIścatasraH̍ pradiśaH|̍ vAtapatnIraBi̍ sUryO# vicaśhTE| tAsA̱M tvA jarasa AdadhAmi|̍ pra yakśhma# Etu niṛ RutiM̍ parAqcaiH| | amOci̍ yakśhmA̱d-duritA-davartyai|̍ 26 (10)

druhaH pAśAqnniṛ Rutyai̍ cOdamOci|̍ ahAq avartimavi̍dath̍ syOnam| apyaBUd-BadrE̍ sukRutasya̍# lOkE| | sUryamRutaM̍ tamasO̍ grAhyAq yat| dEvA amu~jca-nnasRu̍janvyE̍nasaH|̍ EvamahamimaM kśhE̱triyAjjAmiśaṃqsAt|̍ druhO mu~jcAmi̍ varuṇasya̍ pAśA̱t| | bRuhaspatE̍ yuvamindraśca̍ vasvaH|̍ divyasyEśAthE̍ uta pArthivasya|̍ dhattaṃ rayiṅ stuvatE̍ kIrayE# cit| 27 (10)

yUyaM pAta̍ svastiBiH sadA# naH| | dEvAqyudhamindramAjOhuvAnAH|̍ viśvAqvRudhamaBi̍ yE rakśhamAṇAH|̍ yEna# hatA dIrGamaddhvAnamAyann̍|̍ anantamarthamanivarth-syamAnAH|̍ | yattE# sujAtE himavathsu̍ BEśhajam| mayOBUH śaMtamAq̍ yaddhRudO&si|̍ tatO# nO dEhi sIbalE| | adO giriByO adhi yat pradhAvasi|̍ saṃqśOBamAnA̍ kanyEva̍ śuBrE| 28 (10)

tAM tvAq mudgalA̍ haviśhA# varddhayanti| sA naH̍ sIbalE rayimABAjayEha|̍ | pUrvaM̍ dEvAq aparEṇA-nupaśya~jjanma̍BiH|̍ janmAqnyavaraiH̍ parAṇi|̍ vEdAni̍ dEvA ayamasmIti mAm| ahaṃ hitvA śarIraM̍ jarasaH̍ parastA̱t| | prAqṇAqpAqnau cakśhuH śrOtra̱m| vAcaM manasi̍ saMBRutAm|̍ hitvA śarIraM̍ jarasaH̍ parastA̱t| A BUtiM BUtiM̍ ~MvayamaśnavAmahai̍ ( )| | imA Eva tA uśhasO yAH prathamA̍ vyaucCann|̍ tA dEvyaH̍ kurvatE pa~jca# rUpA| śaśvatIrnAva̍pRujyanti|̍ na gamantyanta̱m|̍ | 29 (14) 2. 5. 7 upahOmAH

vasUnAqM̍ tvA&&dhItEna|̍ rudrAṇAmUrmyA|̍ AqdityAnAqM tEjasA|̍ viśvEśhAM̍ dEvAnAqM kratunA|̍ marutAqmEmnA# juhOmi svAhA̱| | aBiBUti-rahamAga̍mam|̍ indrasaKA̍ svAqyudhaH|̍ AsvAśAsu̍ duśhśhahaH|̍ | idaM ~MvarcO# agninA# dattamAgA̱t| yaśO BargaH saha OjO balaM̍ ca| 30 (10)

dIrGAqyutvAya# śataśAradAya|̍ pratigRuBṇAmi̍ mahatE vIryAya|̍ | Ayurasi̍ viśvAyurasi|̍ sarvAyurasi̍ sarvamAyurasi|̍ sarvaM̍ ma AyurBUyAt|̍ sarvamAyurgEśham|̍ | BUrBuvaH suvaH|̍ | agnir-dharmEṇAnnAqdaH|̍ mRutyur-dharmEṇAnnapatiH|̍ brahma# kśhatraṅ svAhA̱| | 31 (10)

prajApatiH̍ praṇEtA| bRuhaspatiH̍ pura EtA| yamaH panthA̱H| candramA̱H punarasuH svAhA̱| | agnirannAqdO&nna̍patiH|̍ annAdyamasmin.̍ yajñE yajamAnAya̍ dadAtu svAhA̱| | sOmO rAjAq rAjapatiH|̍ rAqjyamasmin. yajñE yajamAnAya̍ dadAtu svAhA̱| | varuṇaH̍ samrAT thsamrATpatiH|̍ sAmrA̱jyamasmin. yajñE yajamAnAya̍ dadAtu svAhA̱| | 32 (10)

mitraH kśhatraM kśhatrapatiH|̍ kśhatramasmin. yajñE yajamAnAya̍ dadAtu svAhA̱| | indrO balaM balapatiH|̍ balamasmin.̍ yajñE yajamAnAya̍ dadAtu svAhA̱| | bRuhaspatir brahma brahmapatiH|̍ brahmAqsmin. yajñE yajamAnAya̍ dadAtu svAhA̱| | savitA rAqśhTraṃ rAqśhTrapatiH|̍ rAqśhTramasmin. yajñE yajamAnAya̍ dadAtu svAhA̱| | pUśhA viśAM ~MviTpatiH|̍ viśamasmin.̍ yajñE yajamAnAya̍ dadAtu svAhA̱ ( )| | sarasvatI̍ puśhTiH puśhTipatnI|̍ puśhTimasmin.̍ yajñE yajamAnAya̍ dadAtu svAhA̱| | tvaśhTA# paśUnAM mithunAnAṃ̍# rUpakRud-rUpapatiH|̍ rUpEṇAqsmin. yajñE yajamAnAya̍ paśUn dadAtu̍ svAhA̱| | 33 (14) special kOrvai (agniH sOmO varuṇO̍ mitra indrO bRuhaspatiH̍ savitA pUśhA sarasvatI tvaśhTAq daśa)̍ 2. 5. 8 upahOmAH

sa I̱M pAhi ya RujIśhI̍ tarutraH|̍ yaH śipravAn̍ vRuśhaBO yO matInAm|̍ yO gO̱traBid-vajraBRudyO̍ hariśhThAH|̍ sa indra̍ citrAṃ aBitRundhi̍ vAjAn|̍ | A tE śuśhmO# vRuśhaBa Etu̍ paścAt| OttarAdadharAgA̍ purastA̱t| A viśvatO# aBi samE̱tvarvA~g| indra# dyumnaṃ suvarvaddhEhyasmE|̍ | prOśhvasmai̍ purOratham| indrAya̍ śUśhamarcata|̍ 34 (10)

aBIkE# cidu lOkakRut| sa~ggE samathsu# vRutrahA| asmAkaM̍ bOdhi cOditA| naBantA-manyakEśhA̱m|̍ jyAqkA adhi dhanvasu|̍ | indraM̍ ~Mvayaṃ śunAqsIra̱m|̍ asmin. yajñE havAmahE|̍ AvAjairupa# nO gamat| | indrAya̍ śunAqsIrAya|̍ srucA juhuta̍ nO haviH| 35 (10)
